replies.body:
"win an invasion: onslaught mode as a pre-made group of 5" mission.
way to exclude people that don't actually have anyone to play with. thanks, riot.
And S grade is a joke. So hard
these missions are just soo boring. ive done every single one so far, doubt i'll be doing any of these star guardian ones tho, WAY too time consuming. but we'll see
Onslaught mode is literally impossible and need 5 pre-made to pass the missions so, I see a number of people only being able to finish the first one.

It took me and my team 3 hours to finally beat, dear god it was hard. It's almost like playing a bullet hell but you can't see where half the projectiles are because of everything else going on around you.

Guys I got the Star Guardian Ahri skin shard through thte capsule and if I want to get the loading screen for it. So does this mean if I already have the skin and buy the bundle. Will I only be paying for the summoner icon and the loading screen. And also receiving the loading screen.
Yes - confirmed! I had enough skin shards to get all 5 skins then I bought the bundle, got the 5 icons, the ward and the load screens (i think they're attached to the icons).
What do you mean you had enough skin shards to get all 5 skins?
I err.. own all the skins.. pretty sure Riot owe me shares in the company by now.. -_-' But when these got released I had 15 duplicate shards that I re-rolled to get 5 skin permanents.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Yeh I had to buy the bundle for the borders
don't think you'll get the loading screen boarder though because you wouldn't be buying the skin in the bundle.
Not True. I already had all 5 skins before I bought the bundle and I have all 5 borders.
This gamemode right now is ridiculously hard, how are you supposed to complete the missions.
pre-made group....just makes me feel lonely while im playing this game from now on , thx riot
do you need to equip the icon for the missions?
Hey Riot! Not sure if this is for everyone, but the youtube link for Soraka's spotlight is shown on Syndra's page while Syndra's spotlight is on Soraka's page! :)
Thx riot the hard missions are fkin hard. NO markman and utility is soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo hard.Cant believe I spent 5 hours on these BS.
